page.title: 09BUS SERVICES FROM WORKSOP
page.content: There are 25 bus routes from Worksop including school buses. They go East to Gainsborough, North to Doncaster, South to Nottingham and West to Chesterfield. Some services run buses every 15 minutes, some every two hours and some only once or twice a week. Most buses are operated by a driver who also collects the fares. Fares are worked out on mileage. It is about 40-50 pence for five miles for an adult and half-price for children aged five to fifteen. Dogs are also half-price. The highest fare is Â£2.50p return. The company takes between Â£3,000 and Â£5,000 per day in fares.
